item.title: How to configure Tuttle?
item.description: Tuttle is configured in modules/config.xqm in your Tuttle installation. You may use eXide to edit the config.xqm. Below is an example configuration that shows an example for either Github and Gitlab. Due to the different API of these services the configuration differs sligtly. See parameter description below.
